text: Lucca Comics & Games is an annual comic book and gaming convention in Lucca, Italy. It usually happens at the end of October. It is the largest comics festival in Europe, and the second biggest in the world after Comiket in Japan. It was founded in 1965 as "Il salone internazionale di Comics". 2700 attendees came to the convention in 2016. Over 3000 attendees came in 2022. Category:Italian culture
title: Lucca Comics & Games
